titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Flags of the University of Michigan

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Flags of the University of Michigan

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Photographs and other supplementary materials will be found in the records of the President and of the Board of Regents.

archdesc.bioghist: Professor in the University of Michigan College of Architecture and Design; designer and maker of flags for university president, schools, colleges, and the board of regents.
archdesc.scopecontent: Descriptive text to accompany each of the flag designs.
